title: S- game with no token reward?
body: So, I recently played a game of Poro King and I got an S- on Malzahar but I didnt get a token. Are they random from S- games?

replies.body:
If you have been toxic you aren't eligible to receive rewards and it takes a lot of games until you can receive them again.

Did it say "You are not eligible for mastery tokens" or something?

Hey there,

Mastery 6 or 7? Mastery 7 tokens can only be earnt from S or S+ games.
Ah, as it would turn out. Rotating game modes do not grant mastery tokens.
